plot.content:
Playing on the hybrid of digital and physical art. The robot applies a very mechanical curve motion on a very analog and organic process with a brush & eye-dropped ink on the canvas. Dimaine Turquoise ink on A4 Arches watercolor paper.

Plotted during a live stream on https://twitch.tv/greweb

data.title: Turquoise curves
data.description: Playing on the hybrid of digital and physical art. The robot applies a very mechanical curve motion on a very analog and organic process with a brush & eye-dropped ink on the canvas. Dimaine Turquoise ink on A4 Arches watercolor paper.

next.content:
Plotted live during NFC Lisbon conference on 10 cm square watercolor paper with fountain pen.

This uses a "low poly custom perlin noise" to implement mountains and sky. It is a continuation of Horizon of hope in a more minimalistic way of the small size of the plot.

data.title: [NFC] Vallons
data.description: Plotted live during NFC Lisbon conference on 10 cm square watercolor paper with fountain pen.
